pkgmetadata.longdescription:
These are bundled export templates.
If you don't unpack them, allow the Godot editor to unpack them.
All prebuilt export templates come with debug and release configurations.
Export template platforms for standard (from zip file list inspection):
Android (armv7, arm64v8, x86, x86-64) iOS (arm64, arm64-x86_64-simulator [Universal 2 binary]) Linux (x86, 32-bit) Linux (x86-64, 64-bit) JavaScript (WASM, GDnative, threads) macOS (x86-64, 64-bit) Universal Windows Platform (UWP, arm, 32-bit) Universal Windows Platform (UWP, 64-bit) Windows (x86, 32-bit) Windows (x86-64, 64-bit)
Export template platforms for Mono (from zip file list inspection):
Mono template libraries support BCL, .NET (2.0, 4.0, 4.5)
Android (armv7, arm64v8, x86, x86-64, MonoDroid) iOS (arm64, arm64-x86_64-simulator [Universal 2 binary], MonoTouch) JavaScript (WASM) Linux (x86, 32-bit) Linux (x86-64 64-bit) macOS (x86-64, 64-bit) Windows (x86, 32-bit) Windows (x86-64, 64-bit)
